kv2.4:1.3: Arahā paraneyyo parapattiyo parapaccayo parapaṭibaddhabhū, na jānāti na passati sammūḷho asampajānoti?
kv2.4:2.1: ☑ Nanu arahā na paraneyyo na parapattiyo na parapaccayo na parapaṭibaddhabhū jānāti passati asammūḷho sampajānoti?
kv2.4:2.3: Hañci arahā na paraneyyo na parapattiyo na parapaccayo na parapaṭibaddhabhū, jānāti passati asammūḷho sampajāno, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.4:3.1: ☑ Atthi puthujjanassa paravitāraṇā, so ca paraneyyo parapattiyo parapaccayo parapaṭibaddhabhū, na jānāti na passati sammūḷho asampajānoti?
kv2.4:3.3: Atthi arahato paravitāraṇā, so ca paraneyyo parapattiyo parapaccayo parapaṭibaddhabhū, na jānāti na passati sammūḷho asampajānoti?
kv2.4:4.1: ☑ Atthi arahato paravitāraṇā, so ca na paraneyyo na parapattiyo na parapaccayo na parapaṭibaddhabhū, jānāti passati asammūḷho sampajānoti?
kv2.4:4.3: Atthi puthujjanassa paravitāraṇā, so ca na paraneyyo na parapattiyo na parapaccayo na parapaṭibaddhabhū, jānāti passati asammūḷho sampajānoti?
kv2.4:5.3: Atthi arahato satthari paravitāraṇā, dhamme paravitāraṇā, saṃghe paravitāraṇā, sikkhāya paravitāraṇā, pubbante paravitāraṇā, aparante paravitāraṇā, pubbantāparante paravitāraṇā, idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu paravitāraṇāti?
kv2.4:6.1: ☑ Natthi arahato satthari paravitāraṇā, dhamme paravitāraṇā …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu paravitāraṇāti?
kv2.4:6.3: Hañci natthi arahato satthari paravitāraṇā, dhamme paravitāraṇā …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu paravitāraṇā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.4:7.1: ☑ Atthi puthujjanassa paravitāraṇā, atthi tassa satthari paravitāraṇā, dhamme paravitāraṇā …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu paravitāraṇāti?
kv2.4:7.3: Atthi arahato paravitāraṇā, atthi tassa satthari paravitāraṇā, dhamme paravitāraṇā …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu paravitāraṇāti?
kv2.4:8.1: ☑ Atthi arahato paravitāraṇā, natthi tassa satthari paravitāraṇā, dhamme paravitāraṇā …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu paravitāraṇāti?
kv2.4:8.3: Atthi puthujjanassa paravitāraṇā, natthi tassa satthari paravitāraṇā, dhamme paravitāraṇā …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu paravitāraṇāti?
kv2.4:9.3: Nanu arahato rāgo pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṃkato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammoti?
kv2.4:9.5: Hañci arahato rāgo pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṃkato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.4:10.5: anottappaṃ pahīnaṃ ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṃkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammaṃ …pe…
kv2.4:10.14: Hañci arahā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.4:11.2: Sadhammakusalassa arahato atthi paravitāraṇā, paradhammakusalassa arahato natthi paravitāraṇāti.
kv2.4:13.1: ☑ Sadhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, atthi tassa paravitāraṇāti?
kv2.4:13.3: Paradhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, atthi tassa paravitāraṇāti?
kv2.4:15.1: ☑ Paradhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, natthi tassa paravitāraṇāti?
kv2.4:15.3: Sadhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, natthi tassa paravitāraṇāti?
kv2.4:16.1: ☑ Paradhammakusalassa arahato doso pahīno, moho pahīno …pe…
kv2.4:17.4: “jānatohaṃ, bhikkhave, passato āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmi, no ajānato no apassato.
kv2.4:17.5: Kiñca, bhikkhave, jānato kiṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti, ‘iti rūpaṃ’ …pe…
kv2.4:17.7: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hotī”ti.
kv2.4:18.4: “jānatohaṃ, bhikkhave, passato āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmi, no ajānato no apassato.
kv2.4:18.5: Kiñca, bhikkhave, jānato kiṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti, ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti—
kv2.4:18.6: bhikkhave, jānato passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti, ‘ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo’ti …pe…
kv2.4:18.8: ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti jānato passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti.
kv2.4:18.9: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hotī”ti.
kv2.4:19.4: “sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya;
kv2.4:19.5: sabbañca kho, bhikkhave, abhijānaṃ parijānaṃ virājayaṃ pajahaṃ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā”ti.
kv2.4:21.4: “yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvakassa virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi—
kv2.4:21.5: ‘yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamman’ti, saha dassanuppādā, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa tīṇi saṃyojanāni pahīyanti—
kv2.4:25.4: Nanu arahato itthipurisānaṃ nāmagottaṃ pare vitāreyyuṃ, maggāmaggaṃ pare vitāreyyuṃ, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatīnaṃ nāmaṃ pare vitāreyyunti?
kv2.4:25.6: Hañci arahato itthipurisānaṃ nāmagottaṃ pare vitāreyyuṃ, maggāmaggaṃ pare vitāreyyuṃ, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatīnaṃ nāmaṃ pare vitāreyyuṃ, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv2.4:26.1: ☑ Arahato itthipurisānaṃ nāmagottaṃ pare vitāreyyuṃ, maggāmaggaṃ pare vitāreyyuṃ, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatīnaṃ nāmaṃ pare vitāreyyunti, atthi arahato paravitāraṇāti?
kv2.4:26.3: Arahato sotāpattiphalaṃ vā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arahattaṃ vā pare vitāreyyunti?
